page.title: 16VILLAGE POSTOFFICE
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7am. Prepare breakfast and pack my husbands lunch. At 7.30am I get my daughter Amanda and son Martin up for school.I then make the beds and do more household chores. At 8.30am I go into the Post Office to prepare for opening at 9.00am. Usually I am busy in there all morning. Martin arrives home for his dinner at 12.10. I carry on working until I close the Post Office at 1.00. In my lunch hour I prepare food for tea. I reopen Post Office at 2.00 and work until 5.30. We have tea at about 6.00. I then finish any paper work in Post Office. If weather is good I do gardening or I may watch television. I go to bed at about 11.00 to be ready to start another day.
